help_message.en-us: This is a AI chat bot which can execute commands by recognizing the human language. Current features: â˜€ï¸ Weather forecast Type your request by specifying the location and date (if no date specified, the forecast for today will be given). Sample request: What is the weather in London now? ğŸ Image search Type your request by specifiyng what image do you want to search for. Sample request: Find a picture of a cute cat. ğŸ— Other features under construction... Press the buttons below to view this message in one of supported languages.
